allowedInitialsColors.description: An array of colors that can be used for autogenerated initials. By default, all default Mantine colors can be used except gray and dark.
allowedInitialsColors.description_zh: 可用于自动生成的首字母的颜色数组。默认情况下，可以使用除灰色和深色之外的所有默认 Mantine 颜色。

alt.description: Image alt attribute, also used as title attribute for placeholder
alt.description_zh: Image alt 属性，也用作 placeholder 的 title 属性

autoContrast.description: Determines whether text color with filled variant should depend on background-color. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定具有 filled 变体的文本颜色是否应取决于 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

children.description: Avatar placeholder, displayed when src={null} or when the image cannot be loaded
children.description_zh: 头像占位符，当 src={null} 或无法加载图像时显示

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, default value is 'gray'
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，默认值为 'gray'

gradient.description: Gradient configuration used when variant="gradient", default value is theme.defaultGradient
gradient.description_zh: variant=“gradient” 时使用的渐变配置，默认值为 theme.defaultGradient

name.description: Name of the user. When src is not set, used to display initials and to generate color when color="initials" is set.
name.description_zh: 用户的名称。如果未设置 src ，则用于显示首字母并在设置 color=“initials” 时生成颜色。

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, '100%' by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 border-radius，默认为 '100%'

size.description: Width and height of the avatar, numbers are converted to rem, 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 头像的宽度和高度，数字默认转换为 rem、'md'

src.description: Image url, if the image cannot be loaded or src={null}, then placeholder is displayed instead
src.description_zh: Image url，如果无法加载图像或 src={null}，则显示 placeholder
